m_szDocTitle: Growth funds are dumping Apple stock on anticipated iPhone sales decline | VentureBeat | Mobile | by Reuters
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Growth funds are dumping Apple stock on anticipated iPhone sales decline Tags: Apple , iPhone Image Credit: REUTERS/Mike Segar (By David Randall, Reuters) – Major U.S. growth mutual funds have been among the largest sellers of Apple shares over the past six months, fueling speculation that the company’s days of supercharged growth have come to an end. Amid concerns that iPhone sales may be set to drop, the $77.3 billion American Funds Capital World Growth & Income Fund has sold all of its 1.7 million Apple shares since the end of June, according to Lipper data.
